title: The Mystery of Maple Creek
description: A small town of Maple Creek in Canada, known as a peaceful place to go. But a mysterious legend unfolds. It is told by the elders; there is an evil ripper who hunts down women at night. In the present day, Hellen Mayweather, a 27-year-old girl moves to town with her dad. Since then, she meets the mysterious Noah Jarlath. He keeps secrets like everyone else in town. But Hellen demands the truth to be told.
author: Keefe R.D.
